sentence: “Today, thanks to strong collaboration with our local law enforcement partners, we shut down a major drug trafficking operation in Western Pennsylvania,” Attorney General Josh Shapiro said in a statement.
author: Megan Guza
title: AG: 30 pounds of fentanyl, $535K, 6 cars seized during Braddock drug bust

sentence: By: KDKA-TV News Staff PITTSBURGH (KDKA) - A "predatory" used car dealership in Penn Hills has been banned from doing business in Pennsylvania, Attorney General Josh Shapiro announced Monday.
title: 'Predatory' Penn Hills Dealership Banned From Selling Cars In Pennsylvania

sentence: Attorney General Josh Shapiro announced in a press release Monday that Martino Motors, 536 Rodi Road, violated an Assurance of Voluntary Compliance (AVC) that the dealership entered into in 2014.
author: Tanisha Thomas
title: AG Josh Shapiro bans Martino Motors from selling cars
